Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Championship \Cham"pi*on*ship\, n. State of being champion; leadership; supremacy. [1913 Webster]

championship n 1: the status of being a champion; "he held the title for two years" [syn: {title}] 2: the act of providing approval and support; "his vigorous backing of the conservatives got him in trouble with progressives" [syn: {backing}, {backup}, {patronage}]
